Title: Requires entities selling zero-emission school buses to provide an independent range estimate to prospective purchasers
Summary: Requires entities selling zero-emission school buses to provide an independent range estimate to prospective purchasers; requires the office of general services to promulgate regulations and to provide zero-emission school bus manufacturers with a list of parties that may provide independent range verification.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring entities selling zero-emission school buses to provide an independent range estimate to prospective purchasers
